message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I'll take 60% and you take 40%
Let's compromise, Alice. I'll take 50% and you take 50%
I'm not sure 50-50 is fair, considering my initial proposal. Can we try to find a compromise between 60-40 and 50-50?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between 60-40 and 50-50. How about 55-45?
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You'll get 48% and I'll get 52%
I'm not sure 48% is enough for me. Can we try to push for a better deal?
I'm willing to give up a bit more to get closer to the original 60-40 split. How about 52-48?
